text: Charles Wesley "Bobo" Shaw (September 15, 1947 - January 16, 2017) was an American jazz drummer. He worked in the free jazz genre. He was best known as a member of the Human Arts Ensemble and Black Artists Group. He was born in Pope, Mississippi. Shaw died on January 16, 2017 in St. Louis, Missouri. He was 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * [ Charles "Bobo" Shaw] at Allmusic Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American drummers Category:American jazz musicians Category:Disease-related deaths in Missouri Category:Musicians from Mississippi
title: Charles "Bobo" Shaw
